ComicInfo.Summary:
After having narrowly escaped the hotel infested with hunter bots last issue, Robyn, Golem, and their new friend are trying to regroup in the tunnels under the city. But something isn’t right and this group of allies are going to be put to the test. Meanwhile, the Mayor’s larger plans are revealed and it’s not looking good for our green-hooded archer as this series begins to heat up!
